per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.35*sin(1.14*time) + 0.16*sin(1.5*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.36*sin(1.27*time) + 0.15*sin(1.11*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.37*sin(1.284*time) + 0.15*sin(1.3*time);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = wave_g;
per_frame_7=ob_b = wave_r;
per_frame_8=ob_g = wave_b;
per_frame_9=ib_r = wave_r;
per_frame_10=ib_b = wave_g;
per_frame_11=ib_g = wave_r;
per_pixel_1=ci=(1-abs(-2*x+1)*1.33+(1-abs(-2*y+1)))*rad*6-bass/9 ;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=grid=sin(ci*9);//+(cj*13)%2;
per_pixel_4=zoom=.98-grid/39;//q8*.07*cos(rad*3.14*q3+abs(rad-.1*q6)*q2+rad*3.14*sin(time*q1)+q7)*bnot(grid);
per_pixel_5=dkdx=dx;//////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_6=dkdy=dy;
per_pixel_7=dksx=sx;
per_pixel_8=dksy=sy;
per_pixel_9=dkrt=rot;
per_pixel_10=dkzm=zoom;
per_pixel_11=dkcx=cx;
per_pixel_12=dkcy=cy;
per_pixel_13=dkwp=warp;
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=dx=0;
per_pixel_16=dy=0;
per_pixel_17=sx=1;
per_pixel_18=sy=1;
per_pixel_19=rot=0;
per_pixel_20=zoom=1;
per_pixel_21=cx=.5;
per_pixel_22=cy=.5;
per_pixel_23=warp=0;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=ci=(1-abs(-2*x+1)*1.33+(1-abs(-2*y+1)))-time/3 ;
per_pixel_26=
per_pixel_27=grid=sin(ci*29);//+(cj*13)%2;
per_pixel_28=dy=grid/39;//q8*.07*cos(rad*3.14*q3+abs(rad-.1*q6)*q2+rad*3.14*sin(time*q1)+q7)*bnot(grid);
per_pixel_29=///////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_30=cr1=50*.01;
per_pixel_31=cr2=1*.01;
per_pixel_32=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_33=ci=rad;
per_pixel_34=cb=.5;
per_pixel_35=crs=2;
per_pixel_36=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_37=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_38=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_39=kx1=1-crr;
per_pixel_40=
per_pixel_41=djdx=dx;
per_pixel_42=djdy=dy;
per_pixel_43=djsx=sx;
per_pixel_44=djsy=sy;
per_pixel_45=djrt=rot;
per_pixel_46=djzm=zoom;
per_pixel_47=djcx=cx;
per_pixel_48=djcy=cy;
per_pixel_49=djwp=warp;
per_pixel_50=
per_pixel_51=dx=(jx1*djdx+kx1*dkdx);
per_pixel_52=dy=(jx1*djdy+kx1*dkdy);
per_pixel_53=sx=(jx1*djsx+kx1*dksx);
per_pixel_54=sy=(jx1*djsy+kx1*dksy);
per_pixel_55=rot=(jx1*djrt+kx1*dkrt);
per_pixel_56=zoom=(jx1*djzm+kx1*dkzm);
per_pixel_57=cx=(jx1*djcx+kx1*dkcx);
per_pixel_58=cy=(jx1*djcy+kx1*dkcy);
per_pixel_59=warp=(jx1*djwp+kx1*dkwp);////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_60=
